entries.Title: NBA free agency grades: What Myles Turner brings to Giannis and the Bucks
entries.Author: Kevin Pelton
entries.Summary: Kevin Pelton breaks down the most impactful signings and extensions, including early summer winners in Houston, Atlanta and Memphis.

entries.Title: NBA free agency 2025: Latest signings, news, buzz, live reports
entries.Author: None
entries.Summary: Our NBA insiders have details on all the signings, trades and buzz for the NBA offseason.

entries.Title: Sources: Bucks waive Lillard, agree with Turner
entries.Author: Shams Charania
entries.Summary: The Bucks are waiving Damian Lillard and stretching the remaining $113M on his contract in order to acquire free agent center Myles Turner, sources told ESPN.

entries.Title: Sources: Pistons add Robinson in sign-and-trade
entries.Author: Shams Charania
entries.Summary: Free agent sharpshooter Duncan Robinson has agreed to a three-year, $48 million deal with the Detroit Pistons, sources told ESPN on Tuesday.

entries.Title: Sources: SGA, OKC reach $285M supermax deal
entries.Author: Shams Charania
entries.Summary: NBA MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander has agreed to a four-year, $285 million supermax extension with the Thunder through the 2030-31 season, sources told ESPN.

entries.Title: Sources: Raptors, Poeltl reach $104M extension
entries.Author: Shams Charania
entries.Summary: The Raptors and center Jakob Poeltl have agreed to a four-year, $104 million contract extension through the 2029-30 season, sources told ESPN.

entries.Title: Sources: Cavaliers add Nance on one-year deal
entries.Author: None
entries.Summary: The Cleveland Cavaliers have agreed to a one-year deal with Larry Nance Jr., sources confirmed to ESPN.

entries.Title: Sources: Mann back to Hornets for 3 years, $24M
entries.Author: None
entries.Summary: Tre Mann, a restricted free agent, has agreed to return to the Hornets on a three-year, $24 million deal, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

entries.Title: Sources: Nuggets sign Hardaway Jr. to 1-year deal
entries.Author: Shams Charania
entries.Summary: Free agent guard Tim Hardaway Jr. has agreed to a one-year deal with the Denver Nuggets, sources tell ESPN.

entries.Title: Sources: Kings agree to $45M deal with Schroder
entries.Author: None
entries.Summary: Free agent guard Dennis Schroder has agreed to a three-year, $45 million deal with the Sacramento Kings, sources told ESPN.

entries.Title: 🏀 Seven underrated NBA free agents, plus fits
entries.Author: Zach Kram
entries.Summary: As the Finals showed, a deep bench can make the difference. Here are seven players to watch this week, including former champions and a Hall of Famer.

entries.Title: Grading the Nuggets' roster reshuffle, plus every major trade this summer
entries.Author: Kevin Pelton
entries.Summary: Plenty of deals are getting done this summer. Catch up on the latest trade grades.

entries.Title: How all 30 NBA teams ace their offseason
entries.Author: NBA Insiders
entries.Summary: ESPN's NBA insiders map out the perfect summer for every team.

entries.Title: Why Myles Turner is an excellent fit in Milwaukee
entries.Author: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody
entries.Summary: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody break down all off the trades and signings of the offseason in the NBA, including Myles Turner's opportunity to shine on the Milwaukee Bucks.

entries.Title: NBA summer league 2025: How to watch, schedule, rosters, news
entries.Author: ESPN
entries.Summary: The latest updates from the NBA 2K26 Summer League tournament in Salt Lake City, San Francisco and Las Vegas.

entries.Title: Lakers unveil Statement Edition uniforms for 2025-26 season
entries.Author: Kalan Hooks
entries.Summary: Los Angeles' Statement Edition uniform will feature "LA" on both sides of the shorts for the first time on a core uniform.

entries.Title: Early 2026 NBA mock draft: Meet the four contenders for the No. 1 pick
entries.Author: Jonathan Givony and Jeremy Woo
entries.Summary: There's considerable excitement around next year's draft class thanks to four players vying for the top spot.

entries.Title: Breaking down the best and worst of the NBA draft
entries.Author: Jonathan Givony and Jeremy Woo
entries.Summary: Who was the steal of the draft? Which teams made risky moves? Our experts share their postdraft superlatives.

entries.Title: Which NBA teams' drafts get an A? What about a C-? We have grades for all 30
entries.Author: Kevin Pelton
entries.Summary: Who won the NBA draft? Which picks and trades stood out? Kevin Pelton grades every team's moves.
